title: Synecto
text:
it is a web app for IT-teams allowing you: 

1. Create projects for mutual work **in realtime**. 

2. Discuss your work and take feedbacks from your customers using **Precise comments**. 

3. Systemize your work with Synecto **Task Manager**.

4. Discuss project in real-time using **chat**.

5. Create screenshots, gifs and videos with synecto **app** for Mac OS and Windows.

title: 1. Project
text:
**A Project** ― basic unit of Synecto application. Contains: work folders and files, Task Manager, Trash bin and Project chat. You can add team memebrs on each project, according your plan. 



 ![Проект](/assets/images/docs/synecto_1_1.png)

title: 1.2.  Work with project
text: ### Create a project: 1. Click on a *“Create Project”* button. 2. *Enter project's name* and click *“Create”*. ### Open projects: If you want to open your own or available projects click on *«Open projects»*. ### Rename project: Select a *«Rename»* item in a menu. ### Remove project: Select a *«Remove»* item in a menu. ### Available projects: It are projects in which you were added like a team member. For example your Project Manager can add you in his project and you will see the project in the list.

title: 1.3. Folder/file adding
text: ### To create new folder do following things: 1. Click on *«Add folder»*. 2. Enter name, click *«Next»* button (An arrow). ### To upload file: 1. Select *«Add file»* item in a context menu. 2. Click *«Select file»* in opened window. 3. Select files that you want to upload. After that you will see a list of selected files. Click "Upload" number one. Some files can be previewed. For example images [jpg, png, gif, bmp, etc.] can be previewed and commented via precise comments. Office files [docx,xlsx,pptx] also allowed for previewing.

title: 1.4. Elements renaming
text:
1. Click on a *“Rename”* item in context menu, 

 2. Enter new name, 

 3. Click on *“Next”* button or use a *CTRL(CMD)+Enter* shortcut.

title: 1.5. Elements removing
text: The Folder including all of its content (folders, files) will be removed into ***Trash bin***. You have possibility to cancel removing (*CTRL(CMD)+Z* or *“Undo”* button placed into floating notification). ### One folder removing: Select *«Remove»* item in context menu. ### Removing a few folders: 1. Use *CTRL(CMD)+LMB* combination to mark folders. **A panel of group operation** will be appeared at top of the screen, 2. Click *“Remove”* button placed on the panel. ### The Project removing: Select *“Remove”* item in a context menu of the Project.

title: 2. Uploaded files
text: All of files in Synecto can be managed via the Gallery. To open it just make double click on an image. Or open context menu via right click and select "Open" item.

title: 2.1. Gallery UI
text: At left top corner you can see logo and file's name. At the right: 1. Call button 2. "Share" button 3. Menu button. You can download or remove file here. 4. Close button. At the bottom panel you can find zoom management buttons. Notice precise comment mode is not allowed during zooming. Precise comments will be closed automatically

title: 3. Precise comments
text:
**Precise comments** ― it is a convinient tool to discuss your work with clients and colleagues. The comment can be “glued” to any area of uploaded image. 

 You will be able to  control a max amount of precise comments per image. To do this go to the account settings (p. 9).

title: 3.1. Work with precise comments
text: To add the precise comment on an image you have to: 1. Click on image 2. Enter text of your comment 3. Press "Add comment" button.

title: 3.2. Precise comments lemitations
text:
To prevent “cluttering” of your image you can set up the maximum amount of comments and a maximum amount of comments for certain user. To configure those parameters: 

 1. Open **User's menu** clicking on *e-mail * (top-right area). 

 2. Click on *“Account settings»* item. 

 3. Go to a *«Settings»* tab. 

 2. Configure all values using sliders. 



 ![Stickers restiction](/assets/images/docs/synecto_4_2.jpg)

title: 4. Project's team
text: You can add another users like a project team memebrs to establish collaboration process. Amout of users is limitated by your current plan. For this: 1. Click *«Team»* button located at left panel. You will see window with team adding form. 2. Enter user's e-mail who will be added as team member. 3. Click *«Open»* (Update) button. After you will add user as project team member the name of your project will be added in *«Available project»* of this user (*«Open projects»* button in header). Notice: team members cannot remove elements from trash bin.

title: 5. Trash bin
text: All removed elements will be placed in a trash bin and only from trash bin it can be removed irretrievably. To open trash bin click on *«Trash»* button.

title: 5.2. Trash bin functions
text:
1. ***Sorting***. There is ability to sort elements by name or date. 

 2. ***Empty trash***. Removing of all bin's elements irretrievably. 

 3. ***Restore all***. All elements of trash bin will be restored . 



 ### Removing/restoring of certain element 

 Click on element using left or right mouse button. In first case it will be appeared window with information about the file, also ther are two buttons *«Remove»* and *«Restore»*. In the second case it will be appeared the context menu. 

 ### Removing/restoring of group 

 1. Mark elements using *CTRL(CMD)+LMB* combination.

 2. At the top of screen you will see **Group operation panel**.

title: 6. Task manager
text: The task manager contains tasks bound to opened project only. To go to task manager click on *"Task manager"* button placed at left panel. The project's owner can manage any task added to the project. Another user can: 1. Edit tasks made by itself. 2. Change task status and track time if he/she is asigned on it. 3. Attach files 4. Estimate task difficulty. 5. Comment task.

title: 6.1. «Task list» panel
text: At left of the screen you will see *«Task list»* panel. There are: tasks ***filter*** (1) and ***list*** (2). When you add a task the list will be changed. There are 4 possible statuses: 1. ***«Awaiting»*** ― task is opened but nobody start to work on it. 2. ***«In progress»*** ― task is already started. 3. ***«Completed»*** ― task has been done. 4. ***«Expired»*** ― status will be shown automatically if task was expired. Task list elements: 1. **Status** button. Located at left. Click on *Status* button to ***change the task status***. Statuses change one by one: «in progress», «completed», and «awaiting» again. 2. ***Due date*** — shows how much time is left. This parameter can be set by task's or project's owner. If the parameter won't be set up manually Synecto makes it automatically. 3. ***Subtask amount***. Click on it to focus *Subtask input*. Also there is a number displays amount of current task's subtasks.

title: 6.2.«Task details» panel
text: 1. **«Assign the responsible»** using this button. You can assign only team members or yourself. 2. **«A Task title»**. To change task title click on it. Blur this filed or press *CTRL(CMD)+Enter*. 3. **«Task description»**. You will be able to change task's description same way like a task title. 4. ***«Due date»***. Calendar will be opened by clicking on it. 5. ***«Attach file»***. Click on this button to open file system menu. This menu reflects all your project's files. Choose files or upload new in selected folder. 6. ***«Remove»***. The task will be removed including all its content (files, subtasks) irretrievably. Later we will make possibility to archive it. 7. **«Add subtask»**. Added subtasks can be viewed on «Task's details» panel. Breadcrumbs will be added in case of creating a few levels of subtasks into deep. 8. **«Comments»**. Add new comment via "Comments field". You can reply to another user using appropriate button. 9. **«Task estimation»**. You can estimate task "Estimate" button. You can find more detailed info about task estimation below. 10. **«Time tracking»**. Track time spent on task using "play" button.

title: 6.3. Task estimation
text: Task estimation button is located on task-details section. To estimate task: 1. Click on **«Estimate required»** button (or there will be a number with average estimate) 2. Choose a number in opened window. 3. Press "Select" button. After estimation you can see average estimation and estimation of each user separetly. Using of estimation system in Synecto is not required. All task estimation is done in story points (not human hours). But you can interpritate it whatever you want...

title: 7. Project chat
text: Project chat allows to discuss current objectives in real-time. All chat message is realted with opened project only. That means if you open new project you see new chat. It allows to store all project messages separetly in one special place. To open chat click on "Project chat" button at left menu or same button in header.

title: 8. Desktop app
text: Synecto desktop app allows to create dropws and to upload drops in Synecto projects automatically. Currently you can create screenshots only. To take screenshot: 1. Install app on your computer. 2. Sign in with Google or auth form. 3. Open app menu by clicking on appropriate tray icon (Win - on the botom, Mac - on the top) 4. Click on **Selected area** button 5. Click on dark overlay and stretch rectangle of area you need. 6. Click on white tick. Link on screenshot will be uploaded in clipboard. Created file will be added in "Drops" folder of slected project.

title: 9. Notifications
text: Synecto has ***flash notifications system*** to provide possibility of quick reaction. You will receive notifications if: another user open an access to his project for you, you will be assigned like a responsible, sombody will add a precise comment to your image. To explore all notifications at same time click on *«Notifications»* button. Also you will receive notifications by e-mail. This option can be switched off in Synecto settings. To do this uncheck *«Fetch notifications»* (*«Account settings»* > *«Settings»*).

title: 10. Account settings
text:
To reach Synecto settings, open ***User's menu*** and click ***Account settings***. You will see 3 tabs: 

 1. ***Profile***. Setup your avatar and fill out your name/lastname (this helps to find you more easier). 

 2. ***Account***. Here you can change your password and bind cloud drive accounts. 

 3. ***Settings***. The main settings of the Synecto application

title: Now you are ready to work with Synecto!
text:
